Key Match Events: Jaxson Hayes played nine minutes in the Lakers' loss to the Detroit Pistons, scoring five points, three rebounds and a steal.
Post-Match Reflections: Hayes confirmed that he would cooperate with the NBA investigation, but declined to comment any further on the matter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers' game against the Pistons was not directly affected by the NBA investigation, but the team's decision to allow Hayes to play sparked some controversy.
Others: The NBA reopened its probe into Jaxson Hayes' 2021 arrest hours after TMZ Sports shared new video of a verbal and physical altercation with his then-girlfriend, Sofia Jamora.
